text: Pinto Ben is a 1915 silent film western short written, directed by and starring William S. Hart. It had an alternate title of Horns and Hoofs and was released by Mutual Film. It was rereleased in 1924 by Tri-Stone Pictures.Pinto Ben at silentera.com The film is preserved in the Library of Congress collection. ==Cast== *William S.
